Dry promotions—yet another dumb corporate buzzword. In this video, I break down the latest workplace trend where companies pile on more responsibilities and give you a fancy title... without any pay raise. Sound familiar? Let's dive into how this "promotion" is actually a demotion in disguise, what to do if you're offered one, and how corporate America is trying
title: "DRY PROMOTIONS" - THE NEXT DUMB CORPORATE BUZZWORD?!
